biotools.summary: A novel and robust biclustering algorithm for analyses and interpretation of large-scale RNA-Seq data | A novel biclustering algorithm for analyses of transcriptomic data | QUBIC2 is a novel biclustering algorithm for analyses of gene expression data from bulk and single-cell RNA-Sequencing. This introductory vignette provides an overview of installation and usage
